name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop Scraper - Shopify Product to CSV/Excel
name.zh_CN: Shopify导出助手 - 一键抓取商品导出店铺全部商品

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to export shopify product data to cvs / excel, and automaticaly download images.
short.zh_CN: 一键导出Shopify店铺全部商品, 一键导入Shopify店铺, 同时自动下载商品图片, 支持多属性商品。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop Scraper is a powerful Shopify product exporting tool.

This favorite utility for Shopify lets you export products from any Shopify store in CSV format with blistering ease and speed.

We Provide Many Features You Can Use

* One click to export all products to CSV file
* Select the specified collections to export
* Automatically download product images
* View theme
* Reveal website traffic source
* View Best-selling product

v1.1.0 update
- add WooCommerce/WordPress CSV format
- fix multiple images issue

Copyright notice:
Shop Scraper was developed by UNISPY Team. It is not affiliated with nor endorsed by Shopify Inc. Shopify is a trademark of Shopify Inc. All Shopify icons, images and copyrights are the property of Shopify Inc.

SUPPORT

Questions? Drop us a line at unispy.app@gmail.com
long.zh_CN:
Shopify导出助手是一款功能强大的 Shopify 产品导出工具。

这款最受欢迎的实用程序可让您从任何竞争对手的 Shopify 商店以 CSV 格式轻松快速地导出产品。

功能

* 一键将所有产品导出为 CSV 文件，您可以一键导入所有商品到您的店铺
* 选择要导出的指定类目
* 自动下载产品图片
* 查看店铺装修主题
* 查看网站流量来源
* 查看热卖商品

版权声明：
Shopify导出助手由 UNISPY 团队开发。 它不隶属于 Shopify Inc，也不受其支持。Shopify 是 Shopify Inc. 的商标。所有 Shopify 图标、图像和版权均为 Shopify Inc. 的财产。

支持

任何问题给我们留言 unispy.app@gmail.com
